troubleshooting.title: Mac Touch Bar Function Keys Do Not Work

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: I am using a Mac that has a Touch Bar but its function keys do not work in .

cause.title: Causes
cause.p: By default, the Touch Bar function keys are not enabled for .

steps-informal.p:
To enable the Touch Bar function keys for , follow these steps:
Go to System Preferences and select Keyboard.
Click Shortcuts.
From the left sidebar, select Function Keys.
Click the + symbol, select Oxygen from the list of apps, and click Add.
